revised_title: Investigation of Long X-ray Reflections and Refractive Indices
tldr: This article presents an investigation of the reflection of long X-rays and the determination of their refractive indices using the total reflection method. The authors discuss the theoretical background, experimental setup, and procedure, and provide a comparison between the experimental results and the classical dispersion theory of Drude and Lorentz. The study contributes to the understanding of X-ray physics and the development of X-ray spectroscopy techniques.
